name: ADVENTUROUS KNIGHT: Labyrinth of Love
description:
Join the ADVENTUROUS KNIGHT on their FIRST INTERACTIVE ADVENTURE!

The Knight has stumbled upon an ancient looking Labyrinth. Who knows what untold treasures it guards!?

Features

  • 3 Potential Romantic Interests
  • Hand-Drawn Graphics
  • Whisper Quiet (I didn't have time for music or SFX)
  • A Magical Shovel
  • 5 Ways to Die! 
  • 2 Riddle Gnomes (not romantic)

Made for Global Game Jam 2021 in 48 hours (I'm so tired)

Created with Tyranobuilder
